join: Connect with adventurers, share incredible journeys, and create memories that last a lifetime. No more solo travels - find your perfect travel mate here!
createOrFindDesc: Create your own tour or browse existing tours based on activities, destinations, and dates that interest you.
applyDesc: Find a tour you like? Submit an application to the tour manager explaining why you'd be a great addition to the group.
connectPlanDesc: Once accepted, access the tour group chat to discuss details, coordinate logistics, and get to know your travel companions.
embarkDesc: Experience amazing adventures with like-minded travelers, share costs, and create unforgettable memories.
exploreGroupToursPara: Discover exciting tours organized by fellow travelers, join a group that matches your interests, or create your own tour.
